= Introduction =

This page is a checklist of items to do when creating a new release of Sequel Pro.


= Details =

 * Create svn tag of trunk at tags/release-4.2
 * Checkout the new tag, and do a deployment build
 * Upload to private server (eg: !DropBox) as a release candidate
 * Make sure it at least launches on PPC and Intel macs
 * Post the url to the download at http://twitter.com/sequelpro
 * After 7 days, if there are no blocker bugs, post the build on the main google code downloads page
 * Follow instructions at [MarketingANewRelease]
